scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall-client: cd ui && NODE_ENV=development yarn && yarn build
scripts.postinstall-server: cd api && npm install && npm run heroku-postbuild
scripts.start: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run start-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run start-server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.start-server: NODE_ENV=production cd api && npm run start
